author: cbs8
title: Gary's Grand Wine Experience 10/24-26: Three Days of Wine, Food & Philanthropy -- Get Your Tickets Now!
text:
Gary's Wine & Marketplace
WAYNE, N.J. , Oct. 5, Thanks to the enormous success of previous Grand Tastings-and with overwhelming support from top Napa Valley vintners-this year, Gary's Wine & Marketplace is expanding their annual fall fundraiser into a three-day event: Gary's Grand Wine Experience .
More opportunities for food & wine lovers to explore their passion. Meet top Napa vintners; taste exclusive Napa Valley wines at a symposium moderated by Karen MacNeil , author of The Wine Bible . Attend wine pairing dinners with special guest vintners at NJ's top restaurants. Plus the biggest Grand Tasting event ever!
A bigger celebration means more chances to support beneficiaries, for whom Gary's Wine & Marketplace has raised more than $700,000 over the company's lifespan.
SATURDAY, 10/24 & SUNDAY, 10/25 noon - 4 pm
In-Store Tastings with Vintners and Winemakers - FREE
Gary's Wine & Marketplace
(Madison, Bernardsville , Wayne , Hillsborough, NJ )
SUNDAY, 10/25 4 pm
Napa Vintners Symposium and Tasting
The Madison Hotel ( Morristown )
Discover and taste exclusive Napa Valley wines with the vintners!
Panel discussion moderated by Karen MacNeil , Author of The Wine Bible and Gary Fisch , CEO of Gary's Wine & Marketplace with:
Bruce Philips /Vine Hill Ranch
Kathy Simpson /Barbour Vineyards
Miles MacDonnell /Round Pond Estate
Hugh Davies /J. Davies & Schramsberg
Lindy Novak /Spottswoode Winery
Mike Reynolds /Hall Wines
Wine Dinners with Napa Vintners 7 pm
The Bernards Inn ( Bernardsville ) w/Round Pond Estate & Barbour Vineyards
The Ryland Inn ( Whitehouse Station ) w/ Hall Wines & J. Davies/Schramsberg
Jockey Hollow Bar & Kitchen ( Morristown ) w/ Vine Hill Ranch & Spottswoode Winery
MONDAY, 10/26 7-9:30 pm
Grand Tasting 2015
Park Avenue Club ( Florham Park )
* VIP Admission 6 pm
Hundreds of fine wines, stellar selection of premium spirits & craft brews, savory & sweet pairings.
2015 BENEFICIARIES
Gagnon Cardiovascular Institute (Atlantic Health System)
Atlantic Home Care & Hospice (Morristown Medical Center)
Interfaith Food Pantry of Morris County
Morris Museum
Morris Arts
TICKETS & PACKAGES
Starting at $80
www.garyswine.com/gwx
All events take place in NJ
ABOUT GARY'S WINE & MARKETPLACE
Founded in 1987, Gary's has grown to one of the largest fine wine businesses in the United States , with four locations in New Jersey ( Wayne , Madison , Bernardsville and Hillsborough ) and an online store offering shipping to 37 states. The premier source of top Napa wines in the U.S, Gary's is committed to attentive service, unparalleled selection and myriad wine & food events for the public. Innovation is one of the many reasons Gary's was named 2014 Retailer of The Year ( Market Watch Magazine ) and received a 2015 Great Oak Award from New Jersey Monthly magazine for corporate social responsibility.
